title: 27. Real Talk: Construction Of A Championship Caliber Mindset
itunes:title: 27. Real Talk: Construction Of A Championship Caliber Mindset
description: Have you ever thought why some people are always negative in their thoughts and in their vocabulary? And why they are always stuck battling the same issues all their life? They always keep jumping from idea to idea and keep going through the same cycle forever. Listen to today’s episode to learn how to keep your negative thinking on autocorrect and how not to become one of those people.
